General.Name: Cfoam Ltd
General.Description: CFOAM Limited, through its subsidiary, CFOAM LLC, produces and sells carbon foam products in the United States. The company offers CFOAM carbon foam products, which are inorganic carbon materials manufactured from coal, pitch, or lignin feedstock. Its carbon foam products are used in various markets, including energy absorbing, aerospace tooling, fireproof wall core material, energy absorbing structures, blast protection systems, exhaust systems, and hot structures, as well as thermal protection systems, and structural panels for EMI shielding and RADAR-absorbing application. The company was incorporated in 2016 and is based in West Perth, Australia.

0.Name: Mr. Gary Christian Steinepreis C.A., B.Com., CA
